Hold [_Ctrl_] and click the upgrade in an upgrade slot to activate/deactivate.
tooltip.fxntstorage.backpack.summary: A _handy backpack_ with two storage compartments and six upgrade slots.
tooltip.fxntstorage.backpack.behaviour1: Allows items to stack up to _%dx_ in each slot. Can be accessed by _hoppers_, _funnels_ or _chutes_.
tooltip.fxntstorage.backpack.behaviour2: Can be used with the _Tool Swapper_ upgrade. Protected compartment cannot be accessed by _hoppers_, _funnels_ or _chutes_.
tooltip.fxntstorage.backpack.behaviour3: Accepts _Backpack Upgrades_ to enhance backpack's functionality.
tooltip.fxntstorage.backpack_magnet_upgr: Picks up items and places them into the _item storage_ slots of the backpack. Range can be configured in the _config_.
Does NOT work with _Item Pickup_ active.
Upgrade activates when backpack is either worn or placed on the ground.
Picks up items in a _%d-block_ radius around the player.
Picks up items in a _%d-block_ radius around the backpack.
tooltip.fxntstorage.backpack_pickblock_u: Retrieves block items from the backpack's _item storage_ slots when using _Pick Block_.
Upgrade activates only when backpack is worn on back or chest.
Picks blocks from the _item storage_ slots when there are none in player inventory.
tooltip.fxntstorage.backpack_itempickup_: Items will be placed in _item storage_ slots instead of player inventory.
Upgrade activates only when backpack is worn on back or chest.
tooltip.fxntstorage.backpack_refill_upgr: Refills the selected stack on the _hotbar_ from the _item storage_ slots.
Upgrade activates only when backpack is worn on back or chest.
tooltip.fxntstorage.backpack_feeder_upgr: Feeds the player food when hungry from the _item storage_ slots.
Upgrade activates only when backpack is worn on back or chest.
tooltip.fxntstorage.backpack_toolswap_up: Swaps any tool held in the main hand for the best available tool/weapon from the _tool storage_ slots.
Upgrade activates when backpack is worn on the player's back.
Will prioritize _silk touch_ when beneficial. Only swaps tools from the _tool storage_ slots.
tooltip.fxntstorage.backpack_falldamage_: Prevents the player taking _fall damage_ while wearing the backpack.
Upgrade activates only when backpack is worn on back or chest.
tooltip.fxntstorage.backpack_oremining_u: Mines entire clusters of _matching_ ore blocks. Drops appear near the _original_ block.
Upgrade activates only when backpack is worn on back or chest.
Mine _any_ connected blocks that match the one being mined (up to 64).
tooltip.fxntstorage.backpack_torchdeploy: Automatically places a _torch_ from the backpack when the surrounding light level is low.
Upgrade activates only when backpack is worn on back or chest.
tooltip.fxntstorage.storage_box_void_upg: Once a _Simple Storage Box_ is full, additional items inserted will be _voided_.
Only usable on Simple Storage Boxes
tooltip.fxntstorage.storage_box_capacity: _Doubles_ the storage capacity of a _Simple Storage Box_.
Only usable on Simple Storage Boxes
tooltip.fxntstorage.backpack_flight_upgr: Turns any backpack into a fully functional _jetpack_ with flight and hovering abilities, including _underwater_!
Upgrade activates only when backpack is worn on back or chest.
Uses _Pressurized Air_ from backtanks for fuel. Backtanks must be worn on the chest or stored in the backpack.
Hold _Jump_ to fly upwards to a maximum height of _32 blocks_ above the ground.
Press _%s_, or _Jump_ + _Sneak_ while flying, to enable hovering. Cancel hovering by pressing _%s_ or _Jump_ again.
Hold _Jump_ while gliding with an _Elytra_ equipped to receive a speed boost. Will consume fuel at a _higher_ rate.
fxntstorage.storage_box_void_upgrade_exi: This storage box already contains a void upgrade
fxntstorage.storage_box_capacity_upgrade: This storage box has reached maximum capacity
fxntstorage.ponder.tag.storage.descripti: Items and components related to Create: Storage
fxntstorage.ponder.storage_box_intro.tex: Storage Boxes come in seven variants, each capable of holding large quantities of items
Display panel shows the total items stored and percentage used
Items can be inserted directly using the front panel
Sneak right-click with an empty hand to open the inventory
Indicator light shows the fill status of the storage box
Blue indicates the storage box is empty
Green indicates the box contains items and has free slots
Orange indicates no free slots, however stacks are not full
Red indicates all slots and stacks are full
Right-click with a wrench to activate Void Mode
When enabled, items added beyond capacity will be voided (deleted)
fxntstorage.ponder.storage_box_filter.te: Using items on the filter slot will restrict the items allowed for insertion through the front panel
Double right-click with an empty hand and filter set to insert all matching items from player's inventory
Use brass funnels or smart passers to filter items for extraction
Simple Storage Boxes are available in common wood types
All Simple Storage Boxes have the same attributes
Each box can hold up to 32x the max stack size of one item
fxntstorage.ponder.simple_storage_intera: The front panel displays the item count and percentage used
Items can be inserted directly by right-clicking the front panel...
The filter is set automatically when the first item is added
Use the wrench to remove the filter (only when the box is empty)
Left-click front panel to extract a single item
Left-click while sneaking to remove a whole item stack
Right-click with an empty hand while sneaking to open the inventory menu
fxntstorage.ponder.simple_storage_upgrad: Void and Capacity Upgrades are available for Simple Storage Boxes
Upgrades are applied by using the item on the front panel...
...or adding via the interface accessed by right-clicking while sneaking
Void Upgrade will void (delete) any item added beyond the max capacity
Capacity Upgrade will double the storage for each upgrade
A total of 9 Capacity Upgrades and 1 Void Upgrade can be added
fxntstorage.ponder.passer_intro.text_1: Passer blocks pass items from one container to another
fxntstorage.ponder.passer_intro.text_4: Items will only transfer one at a time, similar to hoppers
fxntstorage.ponder.passer_intro.text_5: Unlike hoppers, Passers lack intermediate storage or inventory
fxntstorage.ponder.smart_passer_intro.te: Smart Passer blocks pass items from one container to another
The value panel specifies the transfer stack size
Items in the filter slot specify what to transfer
Redstone power will prevent Smart Passers transferring items
fxntstorage.ponder.storage_controller_in: Serves as the main input and output point for a Storage Network
When placed next to Simple Storage Boxes...
Items can be inserted into the network via the front panel
Or via automation using funnels, chutes, hoppers or passers
Items can can only be extracted with funnels, chutes, hoppers or passers
Simple Storage Boxes can be connected by Storage Trim...
...to a Storage Network over larger areas (up to 64 blocks)
Illuminates when connected to at least one Simple Storage Box in the network
Items can be inserted into and extracted from the network by interacting with the front panel...
...or via automation using chutes, funnels, hoppers or passers
fxntstorage.ponder.storage_interface_int: Storage Interfaces only function within existing storage networks
It cannot be directly interacted with by the player
Items can be inserted into and extracted from the network with funnels, chutes, hoppers or passers
fxntstorage.configuration.ore_mining_upg: Configuration options for the Backpack Ore Mining Upgrade
fxntstorage.configuration.magnet_upgrade: Configuration options for the Backpack Magnet Upgrade
fxntstorage.configuration.storage_box.to: Configuration options for the Storage Box
fxntstorage.configuration.storage_networ: Configuration options for the Storage Network
fxntstorage.configuration.torch_deployer: Configuration options for the Backpack Torch Deployer Upgrade
fxntstorage.configuration.feeder_upgrade: Configuration options for the Backpack Feeder Upgrade
fxntstorage.configuration.tool_swap_upgr: Configuration options for the Backpack Tool Swap Upgrade
fxntstorage.configuration.jetpack_upgrad: Configuration options for the Backpack Flight Upgrade
fxntstorage.configuration.flight_upgrade: Configuration options for the Backpack Flight Upgrade
fxntstorage.configuration.refill_upgrade: Configuration options for the Backpack Refill Upgrade
